name: Ninja Panda Fruit Land
description:
Really cute jungle panda is attacked by angry fruits! Our panda-shogun is extremly brave samurai and won't give up, but it's need your help. Ninja Panda Fruit Land - are you ready for blitz fruit attack? Let's rescue our brave ninja!

HOW TO PLAY: Follow fruits' attack and tap on the screen to rotate mr panda and fight off. Fruits' speed will raise, so be careful and avoid fruit bump!

Ninja Panda Fruit Land game features:
- Cute japanese style game for all the anime fans;
- Perfect reaction trainer - smash all the fruits;
- Funny timekiller - play as long as you can;
- Сute bamboo panda as a main character;

Panda vs Fruits fight - sounds like something incredible! Ninja Panda Fruit Land - meet your new favorite game!
